titleStmt.title: A paper concerning such as are made ministers by the will of man
titleStmt.author: Fox, Margaret Askew Fell, 1614-1702.
Fox, George, 1624-1691.

notesStmt.note: Attributed by Wing to Margaret Fell.
Consists of three sections, the first signed M.F., and the second and third signed G.F.
Item lacks t.p., title information supplied from first line of text.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
